Common name: fox squirrel eastern fox squirrel Bryant 's fox squirrel
Conservation concern: Low Note : Alabama examples often have a black facial mask with white nose and ears
High Note : Geomys bursarius is pictured , however Geomys pinetis is nearly identical in appearance
Highest/ U.S . Fish and Wildlife lists as endangered . Range limited to Fort Morgan Peninsula and Ono Island in Baldwin County
Highest/ U.S . Fish and Wildlife lists as endangered . Range limited to the barrier island of Perdido Key in Baldwin County , Alabama and Escambia County , Florida
